law.catch_line: Except as otherwise provided in this section, in exercising its powers, the Corporation:...

section.section: The Corporation is subject to the Public Information Act and the Open Meetings Act.
The board and the officers and employees of the Corporation are subject to the Public Ethics Law.

The officers and employees of the Corporation are not subject to:
Division II of the State Personnel and Pensions Article; or
the provisions of Division I of the State Personnel and Pensions Article that govern the State Personnel Management System.

text.section: The Corporation, its officers, and its employees are subject to Title 12, Subtitle 4 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.
The Corporation is exempt from State and local taxes.
